Blog

Here you will find stories, mental-game thoughts, book reviews, and in-depth analysis. This is the place I hope to come back to years from now to accurately recall the meaningful and joyous parts of the adventure as well as feel that I have added a slice of value to others on a similar adventure.

If you want to read more, check out the archives.
